title: A1278 820-28789-B won't shutdown
message:
Hi,

I have an A1278 820-28789-B that powers on by it self when pluged to charger. Also, when I shut it down on macOS, it reboots instead shutting down.

Can you help with that?

title: A1278 820-28789-B won't shutdown
message:
Check PCIE_WAKE_L and MCP_WAKE_REQ_L.
Test disconnecting J3401.

title: A1278 820-28789-B won't shutdown
message: Disconnecting  J3401 worked the shutdown problem. How can I solve this?

title: A1278 820-28789-B won't shutdown
message: Cut off the trace from pin 11/J3401.
